title: @KateyKhaos
body: So, now there's a 750 skin with new particles for auto's and an ability (El Leon Gnar).  How about that Pickpocket {{champion:29}} that I'm always bugging you about?  Let's give him the bullet auto's he deserves.  The rationale for not applying the existing resource from his Mafia skin is now negated by Riot's actions.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

El Leon's (Q) for both Mini and Mega Gnar are both models, which means that they would be in line with being changed for a 750 RP skin. 

Updating the AA for Pickpocket Twitch, AFAIK, it's not something we have plans to change, but I'd be happy to bring it up again to the team.
Thanks, Katey.  You really are the best Rioter.
Nahh. I just like talking a lot. :x
You guys understand that he's currently shooting arrows out of a revolver, right?
its kind of cool in a stupid way
That's because the particle is also part of the model, like Warden Sivir's Q and W
I think he refers to the new boulder for his Q.

Overall they did stuff like this already on other 750 skins.

They said that this is sometimes done when the original particle is too unfitting(for example warden nautilus has a new W particle,because the other one doesn't fit it at all)
